New Records: Kagiso Rabada took his 50th T20I wicket in the match
Key Match Events: South Africa won the toss and opted to bowl first
Heinrich Klaasen scored 81 runs for South Africa
Kagiso Rabada dismissed Ruturaj Gaikwad in the first over
Pre-Game Insights: India were prepared to level the series
South Africa aimed to take a 2-0 lead
Post-Match Reflections: India would regroup for the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Cuttack
India set a target of 149 runs for South Africa
Others: Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 4 wickets for India
